l_english:: bp1_yearly.7000.desc0: "I am on my way to the [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HouseOfWorship] one morning when I run into [distraction_friend.GetTitledFirstName], who is carrying a small bag. Glancing around, [distraction_friend.GetSheHe] conspiratorially opens it revealing all sorts of foods and drink.\n\n"It is such a beautiful day, come join me outside for a morning picnic." [distraction_friend.GetSheHe
column2:
U] says.

As I start to protesting that I'm on my way to the [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HouseOfWorship], [distraction_friend.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] interrupts me: 

"[ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HighGodName] will still be there later, but these [ROOT.Char.Custom('GetExpensiveDessert')] won't." "

l_english:: bp1_yearly.7000.a0: "[ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HighGodName] is more important than breakfast."
bp1_yearly.7000.b0: "The true sin would be letting this opportunity pass."

bp1_yearly.7001.desc0: "My [ROOT.Char.Custom2('RelationToMeShort', fishing_friend)] [fishing_friend.GetFirstName] stops me in the corridor, grinning from ear to ear. In [fishing_friend.GetHerHis] hands are two fishing poles. \n\n"Come fishing with me today, dear [fishing_friend.Custom2('RelationToMeShort', ROOT.Char)]. I promise you will love it!" [fishing_friend.GetSheHe
column2: U] exclaims.\n\nIt has been a while since I took a break and escaped the hustle and bustle of the [ROOT.Char.Custom('FortifiedBuilding')]..."

l_english:: bp1_yearly.7001.a0: "I will catch the fabled white carp!"
bp1_yearly_7001.a.tt0: "You go on a fishing trip"
bp1_yearly.7001.a.toast.white_carp0: "You Catch The Legendary White Carp"

bp1_yearly.7002.desc0: "Having just relieved myself, I saunter over to the window and watch the courtyard below.\n\nMy mood sours when I see my rival, [chamberpot_rival.GetFirstName], walking through the courtyard with an infuriating look of gaiety on [chamberpot_rival.GetHerHis] face. My eyes dart to the full chamber pot next to my bed, perhaps I could do something about that good mood..."
bp1_yearly.7002.b0: "I am an adult, and this is beneath me."
bp1_yearly.7002.a.tt0: "You attempt to empty the chamber pot on them"
bp1_yearly.7002.a.toast.tripped0: "You Slip and Cover Yourself in Excrement!"

bp1_yearly.7003.desc0: "I am searching for [orgy_tapestry_maker.Custom2('MyCharacterIntroduction', ROOT.Char)], but [orgy_tapestry_maker.GetSheHe] is nowhere to be found. Eventually I barge into [orgy_tapestry_maker.GetHerHis] quarters where I don't find #EMP [orgy_tapestry_maker.GetHerHim]#!... but I do find something very interesting.

It appears [orgy_tapestry_maker.GetSheHe] has been working on a tapestry depicting a rather explicit orgy. I'm there, sandwiched between my [ROOT.Char.Custom2('RelationToMeShort', orgy_participant_1)] [orgy_participant_1.GetFirstName] and my [ROOT.Char.Custom2('RelationToMeShort', orgy_participant_2)] [orgy_participant_2.GetFirstName]. Meanwhile my [ROOT.Char.Custom2('RelationToMeShort', orgy_tapestry_maker)] [orgy_tapestry_maker.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] appears to be having a grand old time with [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.DevilName]. In the corner of it all, my [ROOT.Char.Custom2('RelationToMeShort', orgy_participant_3)] [orgy_participant_3.GetFirstName] sits with an enraptured grin.

I am speechless."
bp1_yearly.7003.b0: "I #EMP must#! hang this on my wall."
bp1_yearly.7003.c0: "I took a, uh, wrong turn."

bp1_orgy_tapestry_desc0: "This tapestry depicts [orgy_participant_1.GetFirstName], [ROOT.Char.GetName], [orgy_participant_2.GetName], [orgy_participant_3.GetName] and [orgy_tapestry_maker.GetName] engaging in an orgy. [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.DevilName] is also taking part."

bp1_yearly.7004.desc0: "My [ROOT.Char.Custom2('RelationToMeShort', concerned_friend)] [concerned_friend.GetFirstName] approaches me as I am sitting by the window: "You haven't been the same since... since what happened."\n\n[concerned_friend.GetSheHe
column2: U] doesn't say it but I know [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] is referring to when [bad_memory.GetDescription].\n\n"Perhaps you need someone to talk to? I could be that someone," [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] continues gently."

l_english::
bp1_yearly.7005.desc0: "My friend [borrowing_friend.GetName] comes to me obviously wanting something. Eventually I get tired of [borrowing_friend.GetHerHim] dancing around the subject and demand [borrowing_friend.GetSheHe] tell me.

"Well I was hoping I could borrow your [borrowed_artifact.GetName] for one evening, but you can't ask why..."

[borrowing_friend.GetSheHe
column2: U] is clearly embarrassed by the request. What could [borrowing_friend.GetSheHe] possibly want it for?"

l_english::
bp1_yearly.7006.desc0: "[borrowing_friend.GetName] approaches me eyes downcast. "Please don't be upset".

They lead me to my [borrowed_artifact.GetName] which I can see is badly damaged. 

 "I'm sorry it was an accident" [borrowing_friend.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] looks genuinely distraught."

bp1_yearly.7007.desc0: "[borrowing_friend.GetName] has returned my [borrowed_artifact.GetName]. I'm not quite sure if they've just cleaned it or actually made changes, but it is looking more impressive than ever.\n\n "I hope you like it, I worked on it all evening."[borrowing_friend.GetSheHe] says looking nervous."

bp1_yearly.7010.desc0: "I can't stop thinking about where [tested_friend.GetFirstNamePossessive] loyalties lie. Is [tested_friend.GetSheHe] a true friend, or just a sycophant?

Perhaps a little test will put my mind to rest...

One of my agents, a fake secret, and an anonymous gift. What would make [tested_friend.GetHerHim] betray my trust?"
bp1_yearly.7010.b0: "Two... no, #EMP three#! beautiful [tested_friend.Custom('AttractionWomanManMultiple')], ready and willing."
bp1_yearly.7010.c0: "The promise of riches for [tested_friend.GetHerHis] #EMP other#! friend, [friends_friend.GetFirstNameNoTooltip]."
bp1_yearly.7010.a.tt0: "You believe [tested_friend.GetFirstNamePossessive] loyalty can be bought with gold"
bp1_yearly.7010.b.tt0: "You believe [tested_friend.GetFirstName] would choose carnal pleasures over friendship"
bp1_yearly.7010.c.tt0: "You believe that [tested_friend.GetFirstName] cares more for [friends_friend.GetFirstNamePossessive] friendship than yours"

bp1_yearly.7050.desc0: "I'm back on the battlefield, the mud is clinging to my boots, the rank stench of the dead assaulting my nostrils, once again I'm reliving the day [war_memory.GetDescription].\n\nI wake up gasping, cold beads of sweat clinging to my face."
bp1_yearly.7050.desc.married0: "[sleeping_spouse.GetFirstName] stirs beside me, but doesn't wake. I must deal with my troubles alone."
bp1_yearly.7050.desc.not_married0: "All alone in my room I must deal with these troubles by myself."

bp1_yearly.7051.desc0: "With vivid clarity I remember when [battle_memory.GetDescription]. It was a battle that took place in [battle_area.GetTerrain.GetNameNoTooltip], a terrain I was greatly unprepared for.\n\nSince then I have been mulling things over, I am confident that if the battle happened today I'd be a much more competent leader."
bp1_yearly.7051.a0: "I'll never let it happen again."
bp1_yearly.7051.b0: "I should learn to be flexible."

bp1_yearly.7052.desc0: "The fire roars, drinks have been had, and [story_friend.GetFirstName] is calling out to me for a story.

My first thought is of a famous [ROOT.Char.GetCulture.GetNameNoTooltip] folk tale, a classic that never fails to delight.

On the other hand, what if I told a story of my own life, perhaps of the time [story_memory.GetDescription]."

bp1_yearly.7053.desc0: "As I walk through the courtyard, rage overcomes me once again, the only thing on my mind recently is when [bad_memory.GetDescription].\n\nI must get my revenge on [bad_memory_participant.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] somehow. I look up at the gallows in front of me. Perhaps if I make my moves carefully [bad_memory_participant.GetSheHe] will hang there soon."
bp1_yearly.7053.a.10: "This scheme will have a success chance bonus."

bp1_yearly.7054.desc0: ""[forgotten_memory.GetDescription]?" I ask confused.

My [memory_child.Custom('GetDaughterSon')] [memory_child.GetFirstName] is looking at me concerned. "Of course! You've told this story many many times, don't you remember?"

The truth is I don't remember. Details have been getting fuzzier recently, but perhaps it would be weak to confess as much."
bp1_yearly.7054.b0: "I forget so much these days."
bp1_yearly.7055.desc.positive0: "Some moments must be recorded forever. The time that [recorded_memory.GetDescription] is one of them. Such an incredible memory must be preserved for all of time."

bp1_yearly.7055.desc.negative0: "Some moments must be recorded forever. The time that [recorded_memory.GetDescription] is one of them. It might be a painful memory, but someone has to pass it on to the next generation."
bp1_yearly.7055.desc.neutral0: "Some moments must be recorded forever. The time that [recorded_memory.GetDescription] is one of them."
bp1_yearly.7055.desc.alone_poor_skill0: "I might not be a good writer, but with time and effort I could surely pen something myself.\n\n"
bp1_yearly.7055.desc.alone_good_skill0: "My mastery of the [ROOT.Char.GetCulture.GetLanguage.GetNameNoTooltip] language would make penning this a trivial matter.\n\n"
bp1_yearly.7055.desc.blind0: "Unfortunately, my blindness prevents me from writing anything myself...\n\n"
bp1_yearly.7055.desc.poet0: "My Court Poet, [poet.GetFirstName], could be of great use. [poet.GetHerHis
column2: U] mastery over prose would transform my mundane words into art."

l_english:: bp1_yearly.7055.desc.friend0: "Then again, my dear friend [friend.GetFirstName] is so much better at writing than I am. Surely [friend.GetSheHe] would help if asked?"
bp1_yearly.7055.desc.ending0: "Assembling and illustrating a tome can quickly become a costly endeavor however..."
bp1_yearly.7055.poet0: "The poet [poet.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] will write it down!"
bp1_yearly.7055.a0: "I will record it myself, [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HighGodName] willing."
bp1_yearly.7055.b0: "There is no time for this..."
recorded_memory_desc0: "This tome retells the story of when [recorded_memory.GetThirdPerspectiveDescription].\n\nComposed by [ROOT.Char.GetFirstName]."

bp1_yearly.7056.desc0: "I take [intimidation_target.GetFirstName] down to the dungeon, where I start regaling [intimidation_target.GetHerHim] with tales of terrible things I have done to the people who crossed me.

"I'm sure you've heard about how [intimidation_memory.GetDescription]." I tell [intimidation_target.GetHerHim] with relish. "That was just #EMP the beginning.#!"

As I chuckle, [intimidation_target.GetFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] eyes go wide with fear."
bp1_yearly.7056.a0: "Don't worry, just do what I say and you'll be fine..."

bp1_yearly.7057.desc0: "I'm sitting in the [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HouseOfWorship], my thoughts abandoning the words of [realm_priest.GetCouncilTitleFirstName] in favor of the time [sex_memory.GetDescription]. Ever since then, I've been thinking of [sex_partner.GetHerHim] almost daily."

bp1_yearly.7057.desc.male0: "\n\nUnfortunately this is having some rather noticeable side effects. Perhaps if I position the [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.ReligiousText] just right, I can hide this growing problem without anyone noticing..."
bp1_yearly.7057.desc.female0: "\n\nUnfortunately this is having some rather... problematic side effects."
bp1_yearly.7057.c0: "Where better to relieve stress than the [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HouseOfWorship]?"
bp1_yearly.7057.a.tt0: "This scheme will have a success chance bonus."

bp1_yearly.7058.desc0: "The morning chorus of twittering birds accompany me down to the cellar, the light of dawn giving way to gloomy darkness lit only by sputtering lamps. I yawn and stretch as I go, my feet padding across the floorboards.

Once my eyes adjust to the lack of light, a culinary tragedy is unveiled by them: apple cores, scattered crumbs, bones flensed clean of their meat. In shock, I look around the entire room, but everywhere my eyes land they find yet more evidence.

Suddenly, in the corner, a soft, contented #EMP burp#!..."
bp1_yearly.7058.glutton0: "I have more food! Let's open the #EMP secret stash!#!"
bp1_yearly.7058.a0: "Oh, you'll pay that back. And more, if you have."
bp1_yearly.7058.b0: "If you enjoyed the cellar, you'll #EMP love#! the dungeon!"

bp1_yearly.7030.desc0: "[dead_friend_spouse.GetFirstName] has been devastated ever since [dead_friend_spouse.GetHerHis] [dead_friend.Custom('WifeHusband')] [dead_friend.GetFirstName] died. [dead_friend_spouse.GetSheHe
column2:
U] comes to visit me one evening.

"I feel so lonely." [dead_friend_spouse.GetSheHe] says, looking at me longingly. I remind myself that [dead_friend.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] was my good friend. 

"You've been so comforting." [dead_friend_spouse.GetSheHe] says, biting [dead_friend_spouse.GetHerHis] lip suggestively. [dead_friend.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] was my friend.

"I just want to feel something." [dead_friend_spouse.GetSheHe] whispers, loosening the fastenings on the front of [dead_friend_spouse.GetHerHis] [dead_friend_spouse.Custom('GetUpperClothingArticle')]. [dead_friend.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] #EMP was#! my friend..."

l_english::
bp1_yearly.7100.desc0: "One moment I was enjoying a nice walk in the sunshine around the [owned_county.GetName] and the next I am covered in excrement and wallowing in the mud. Once I have furiously wiped the excreta from my [ROOT.Char.Custom('EyeEyes')], I find the culprit with ease.

"[potential_nemesis.GetTitledFirstName] sends [potential_nemesis.GetHerHis] regards!" The peasant hanging out of the window screams before fleeing the scene.

Pathetically, I try washing one fur I particularly treasure in a nearby stream, but it's clear that it is beyond saving."
bp1_yearly.7100.b0: "I will clean myself in [potential_nemesis.GetHerHis] blood!"
bp1_yearly.7100.c0: "Mark my words, [potential_nemesis.GetFirstNameNoTooltip]: this fur will be replaced."
bp1_yearly.7100.c.tt0: "[potential_nemesis.GetFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] beloved cat was wandering around here earlier..."
bp1_yearly.7100.e0: "I'll save this fur for... later."
focused_on_revenge_modifier_desc0: "This character is solely focused on the demise of their rivals, ignoring many of their responsibilities."
